OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CHURCHES COUNCIL FOR COMMUNITY CARE (SCCCC)

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides a range of practical and caring services across the city, through co-operative working between the co-ordinators, health and social services professionals, the individuals who use the services and volunteers. Runs Good Neighbour Scheme (see separate entry) - visiting, occasional shopping etc, support for the elderly and others in need; Hospital After Care - short term help for 2-3 days for patients considered "vulnerable" on discharge from Sheffield hospitals; Accident & Emergency Out of Hours Scheme; Escort Care - provides escorts for individuals considering moving into residential care. Organises Volunteer Day 6 times per year.
